name: Cannes Aviation Academy
about: Cannes Aviation Academy, based at Cannes - Mandelieu Airport in France, has been training professional and private pilots since 1995 according to EASA/part FCL standards. As the only DGAC-approved professional school in the South-Provence-Côte d'Azur region, it offers both integrated and modular training paths. The academy is committed to excellence in quality and safety, exceeding legal and regulatory obligations. With state-of-the-art facilities, including 450 sq. m. of classrooms and 1,500 sq. m. of hangars, students benefit from multimedia course materials, individual and group study rooms, and a secure online booking system. The academy’s strategic location allows students to practice a variety of flights, including continental, over-sea, and over-mountain flights, within a rich aeronautical environment. Cannes Aviation Academy ensures each student becomes an excellent pilot, distinguished during airline selections.
